snippet: Speaking on television, Vice President Nicolás Maduro said the operation lasted more than six hours.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez is recovering after undergoing cancer surgery in Cuba; operation is at least his third since illness was discovered in June 2011.
lead_paragraph: Speaking on television, Vice President Nicolás Maduro said the operation lasted more than six hours.

headline.main: Venezuela: Surgery on Chávez Is Successful, Government Says
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Surgery on Chávez Is Successful, Government Says
